title: 64BIT
body:
Can someone send me a 64bit: rads_user_kernel i dont know where to go to get it and i reinstail LOL and it only give me 34BIT
Thanks

EDIT:And Im on windows 10

replies.body: There is no 64 bit client... 32bit works on 64 bit OS.
your saying people that use 64 bit cant play LOL

As Gidor mentioned, League is a 32-bit program. The great thing about Windows 64-bit is that it can run 32-bit programs just fine. There's no way to make a 32-bit program turn into a 64-bit program, but that's okay because you should have no issues running it. For more information on the differences between 32 and 64-bit, check out [Microsoft's FAQ.](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/15056/windows-7-32-64-bit-faq)

If you have issues installing or patching League, let me know more details and I can assist you. :)
